project.name: lister
project.title: A homemade list-making application
project.paragraph: This simple list-making application was created to keep track of, and share, which groceries to shop.
Main focus was to learn more about MVC and OOP, as well as MySQL in PHP.
Technologies used are HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL.
